sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Set display = true for model field of sys_nlu_model_status</description> <name>Update model field sys_nlu_model_status</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var dictGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary'); dictGr.addQuery('name', 'sys_nlu_model_status'); dictGr.addQuery('element', 'model'); dictGr.query(); if (dictGr.next()) { dictGr.setValue('display', 'true'); dictGr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-02-02 11:44:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>93c24b81a3342110f066d78446fcdaad</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update model field sys_nlu_model_status</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Core" source="com.glide.nlu">302438683c31311068bcf327dfe37f2f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_93c24b81a3342110f066d78446fcdaad</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-02-02 11:44:00</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
